医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
巴西在消除淋巴丝虫病方面取得里程碑世界卫生组织（WHO）祝贺巴西消除了淋巴丝虫病这一公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Brazil-achieves-milestone-in-elimination-lymphatic-filariasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Brazil-achieves-milestone-in-elimination-lymphatic-filariasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46fb3791-3612-4359-9c9e-be6661f87751 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 15:09:55 -0400 Brazil achieves milestone in eliminating lymphatic filariasis

揭开疟疾寄生虫细胞分裂的秘密诺丁汉大学的一组科学家发现了引起疟疾的寄生虫如何协调细胞分裂——这是寄生虫传播这种致命疾病的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Uncovering-the-secrets-of-malaria-parasite-cell-division.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Uncovering-the-secrets-of-malaria-parasite-cell-division.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78c63586-8faf-49bd-bdb5-cd9c1c086719 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 14:15:14 -0400 Uncovering the secrets of malaria parasite cell division
FOXM1和PD-L1在恶性周围神经鞘瘤抵抗中的作用2024 年 9 月 30 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的小型综述，题为“Linking FOXM1 and PD-L1 to CDK4/6-MEK Targeting Treatment Resistance in malignant Peripheral Neuro Shelf Shes Tumors”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/The-role-of-FOXM1-and-PD-L1-in-malignant-peripheral-nerve-sheath-tumor-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/The-role-of-FOXM1-and-PD-L1-in-malignant-peripheral-nerve-sheath-tumor-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=122d0442-0b23-4e34-b6fc-abd4c6cdb46c Tue, 01 Oct 2024 13:58:59 -0400 The role of FOXM1 and PD-L1 in malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor resistance

新型脂质纳米颗粒增强组织特异性药物输送宾夕法尼亚大学工程师发现了一种新方法，可以引导脂质纳米颗粒（LNP）（一种用于交付 COVID-19 疫苗的革命性分子）靶向特定组织，预示着个性化医疗和基因治疗的新时代。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Novel-lipid-nanoarticles-enhance-tissue-specific-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Novel-lipid-nanoarticles-enhance-tissue-specific-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a923fb09-f559-4f7f-b25b-2fa22586a10c Tue, 01 Oct 2024 12:40:35 -0400 Novel lipid nanoparticles enhance tissue-specific drug delivery

BICAN 发布首个主要数据BRAIN Initiative® 细胞图谱网络 (BICAN) 发布了第一个主要数据，标志着绘制整个人类大脑的雄心勃勃的努力的一个重要里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/BICAN-launches-first-major-data-release.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/BICAN-launches-first-major-data-release.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91d90118-b39e-43e2-8660-762abc9e2367 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 10:59:44 -0400 BICAN launches first major data release

深部脑刺激有望改善受伤后手臂和手的功能匹兹堡大学医学院的研究人员今天在《自然通讯》杂志上报告说，深部脑刺激可能会立即改善因创伤性脑损伤或中风而减弱的手臂和手的力量和功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-improving-arm-and-hand-function-after-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-improving-arm-and-hand-function-after-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=170879dc-ca7d-410c-b73f-bb721e19350e Tue, 01 Oct 2024 10:55:09 -0400 Deep brain stimulation shows promise for improving arm and hand function after injury
